title: Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work.
description:
Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work. 
Description:Color orange doesn't work.
Steps to reproduce:1.
OB: When setting the color or background color of a report item to orange, the color does not change as expected.
EB: The color or background color of a report item should change to orange when it is set to orange.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Insert a report item.
2. Set the color or background color to orange.
3. Observe that the color of the report item does not change to orange.
